Good men and good women, if there are those who hear the names of these Buddhas, they will forever leave karmic hindrances and not fall into evil paths.
If those without eyes recite, they will surely regain their sight.

I, with my bodily actions, verbal actions, and mental actions, fully pay homage, praise, and make offerings to all these foremost buddhas in the ten directions.

The wonderful Dharma spoken by those TathÄgatas, with its profound realm, immeasurable realm, inconceivable realm, and immeasurable realm, I pay homage with my body, speech, and mind, pervading the ten directions, bowing, praising, and making offerings.

In those Buddha-lands, the assembly of irreversible Bodhisattvas and irreversible ÅšrÄvakas, I pay homage with my body, speech, and mind, pervading the ten directions, bowing my head to their feet, praising, and making offerings.

Homage to the Buddha of Immeasurable Subduing in the world of Constant Joy, Homage to the Buddha of Establishing All Dharmas in the world of Universal Mirror, Homage to the Buddha of Universal Vision of All Dharmas in the world of Universal Illumination, Homage to the Buddha of Accomplishing Boundless Excellent Merits in the world of Accomplishment of All Merits, Homage to the Buddha of Wisdom Arising Light in the world of No Defilement, Homage to the Buddha of Padma Victory in the world of No Fear and Utpala, Homage to the Buddha of Ten Directions' Victory in the world of Padma Fear, Homage to the Buddha of Flower Accomplishment Victory in the world of Flower Fear, Homage to the Buddha of Firm Sentient Beings in the world of Heaven, Homage to the Buddha of Wisdom Light in the world of Light.  You should know that I take refuge in immeasurable and boundless Buddhas such as these.

Homage to the Buddha of Cultivated Wisdom in the world of Peaceful and Disciplined Realm, Homage to the Buddha of Far-Removed Womb in the peaceful world, Homage to the King of Light Buddha in the world of Non-Attachment, Homage to the Buddha of Cutting Off All Afflictions in the world of Clouds, Homage to the Buddha of Boundless Wisdom Renown in the world of Universal Color, Homage to the Buddha of Sandalwood House Victory in the world of Firmness, Homage to the Buddha of Accomplishing Incomparable Victory and Flower in the world of Incomparable Merit, Homage to the Buddha of Good Abiding Power King in the world of Jewel, Homage to the Buddha of Moon-Arisen in the world of Foremost in the Ten Directions, Homage to the Buddha of Foremost in the world of Dragon King. You should know to take refuge in immeasurable and boundless Buddhas such as these.
Homage to the Buddha of Good High Accumulation in the world of Good Abiding,
Homage to the Buddha of Making Renown in the world of No Fear,
Homage to the Buddha of Cutting Off Difficulties in the world of Loving Fragrance,
Homage to the Buddha of Renown of Relatives in the world of Good Abiding of Accomplishing All Merits and Goodness,

Homage to the Buddha of World of Renown, the King of Merit of Utpala Flower

Homage to the Buddha of World of Renown in the Ten Directions, the Buddha of Light Radiating Everywhere
Homage to the Buddha of World of Foremost in the Ten Directions, the Buddha of Renowned Eyes. You should know that I take refuge in immeasurable and boundless Buddhas such as these.

Homage to the Buddha Flaming Wisdom in the world of Flaming Wisdom, Homage to the Buddha Renowned in the Ten Directions in the world of Roaring, Homage to the Buddha Independent Marici in the world of Light, Homage to the Buddha Great Light in the world of Jewel Light, Homage to the Buddha Flaming Energy in the world of Constant Joy, Homage to the Buddha Valiant in the Three Realms in the world of Existence, Homage to the Buddha Radiating Light Discs in the world of Fearlessness, Homage to the Buddha Subduing the Multitude in the world of Constant Suspension, Homage to the Buddha Invincible in the world of Lotus King, Homage to the Buddha Wonderful Drum Sound in the world of Universal Roar. You should know that I take refuge in these and other immeasurable, boundless Buddhas.

Homage to the Buddha of Universal Excellence in the world of Fearlessness, homage to the Buddha of Wisdom Excellence in the world renowned in the ten directions, homage to the Buddha of the Mountain King in the world of earth, homage to the Buddha of the Lotus Wheel Realm and Superior King of Merits in the world of merits of the earth, homage to the Buddha of Good Abiding in the world of burning lamps and wheels, homage to the Buddha of Great Adornments in the realm of the Buddha of Universal Adornments, homage to the Buddha of All Accomplished Merits in the world of reliance, homage to the Buddha of Ultimate Accomplishment in the world of joy, homage to the Buddha of Meritorious Treasures, homage to the Buddha of Superior Wisdom in the world of constellations, homage to the Buddha of Wisdom Arising Light and Virtue King in the world of adorned by the practice of parasols. You should know that there are immeasurable and boundless Buddhas like these.
You should know that I take refuge in these and other innumerable, boundless Buddhas.
